name: UForceFeedbackComponent
doc: ForceFeedbackComponent allows placing a rumble effect in to the world and having it apply to player characters who come near it

AttenuationSettings: If bOverrideSettings is false, the asset to use to determine attenuation properties for effects generated by this component
AttenuationOverrides: If bOverrideSettings is true, the attenuation properties to use for effects generated by this component
OnForceFeedbackFinished: called when we finish playing audio, either because it played to completion or because a Stop() call turned it off early
ForceFeedbackEffect: The feedback effect to be played
bIgnoreTimeDilation: Should the playback of the forcefeedback pattern ignore time dilation and use the app's delta time
bOverrideAttenuation: Should the Attenuation Settings asset be used (false) or should the properties set directly on the component be used for attenuation properties
IntensityMultiplier: The intensity multiplier to apply to effects generated by this component

methods.name: AdjustAttenuation
methods.doc: Modify the attenuation settings of the component

methods.name: SetForceFeedbackEffect
methods.doc: Set what force feedback effect is played by this component
